content: this overlay mosaic crochet pattern is chart only - there are no written instructions the chart contains xs and a key no special stitches i ve included a printable multi-page chart and a total chart for viewing in an app or e-reader i created the pattern from a photo of our dog sunrise i ve made it available for free because i feel the world should have more sunrises the pattern is 221 stitches wide by 315 row long my sample blanket came out to 48 inches by 70 inches including a narrow envelope border using dk yarn 8 skeins of the main color in my case black and a g hook your choice of yarn and hook will impact the size of your finished project i hope you enjoy the pattern please contact me with any questions and thank you
